basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=1 µM), S. aureus 710A (MIC=2 µM), S. aureus SA-62 (MRSA) (MIC=4 µM), Bacillus megaterium Bm11 (MIC=1 µM), S. epidermidis ATCC 12228 (MIC=1 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=1 µM), E. coli ML35 (MIC=1 µM), E. coli D21 (MIC=1 µM), E. coli D22 (MIC=0.5 µM), S. enterica ser. Typhimurium ATCC 14028 (MIC=1 µM), S. enterica ser. Enteritidis H2 (MIC=1 µM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=1 µM), S. marcescens ATCC 8100 (MIC=2 µM).Fungi:Candida albicans c.i.
